property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your STyled attacks deal +1 life card of damage. SHIELD POWER: Reveal a Styled attack card from your hand and play it to prevent all damage from an attack instead of as an attack. POWER: Destroy the top card of your Life Deck to gain 2 stages and banish the top or bottom 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Dragon Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects, you may place it into play. CONTINUOUS POWER: Whenever you reveal a card from your hand, banish the top card of your opponent's discard pile. POWER: Gain 2 stages. Choose a card in your opponent's discard pile and banish it.

property.name: Text
property.value: SHIELD POWER: Stops a physical or energy attack. The next time a card is revealed from your hand this combat, Rejuvenate 2 and banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects, gain 3 stages.) POWER: Banish the bottom 5 cards of your opponent's discard pile. If you banished less than 5 cards, destroy the difference from the top of your opponent's Life Deck. If a Dragon Ball is destroyed by this effect, you may place it into play under your control instead of your opponent placing it on the bottom of their Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: CONTINUOUS POWER: Your opponent cannot use Endurance on your copied attacks. INSTANT POWER: Use after performing a successful copied attack.
